**Description**: Path to where the online emission datasets are found
Name of the main emission netCDF file (online emissions)
Name of the netCDF file for vertical profile scaling (online emissions)
Name of the netCDF file for 'hour of day' scaling (online emissions)
Name of the netCDF file for 'hour of year' scaling (online emissions)
Name of the netCDF file for 'day of week' scaling (online emissions)
Name of the netCDF file for 'month of year' scaling (online emissions)
Path to the directory containing bioflux-files

Prefix of the the bioflux-files. Filenames are assumed to be ``{vprm_prefix}YYYYMMDDHH.nc``. If multiple bioflux-datasets exists, this is a list of prefixes. All files are assumed to be in ``vprm_dir``
Path to the directory containing netCDF files with pre-processed MODIS reflectance (``modis_filename``) and vegetation class fraction (``vegetation_filename``) data
Name of the pre-processed MODIS netCDF file
Name of the pre-processed vegetation class fraction netCDF file
Path to the processed CAMS-files. Processed CAMS-files are stored here, if there are files found here then ``cams_dir_orig`` is not used
Parameters for the processing of CAMS-data, more information in ``config.py`` of example case
List of variables for the post_int2lm-job
Number of hours between restarts of cosmo
